explains: n. 专长，专门技能（知识）；专家的意见

sentences.en: Griffith's expertise is in writing legal briefs.
sentences.cn: 格里菲思的专长在于撰写法律案情摘要。

sentences.en: We have the expertise to help you run your business.
sentences.cn: 我们有帮助你经营自己业务的专门知识。

sentences.en: We need to tap the expertise of the people we already have.
sentences.cn: 我们需要利用我们现有人员的专业知识。
